sentences.en: Barry was holding forth on politics.
sentences.cn: 巴里正在滔滔不绝地谈论政治。

sentences.en: Dr. Mesibov set forth the basis of his approach to teaching students.
sentences.cn: 梅西伯夫博士阐述了他的教学方法的基础。

sentences.en: I came forth to take the air.
I could see the branches of the trees moving back and forth.
sentences.cn: 我能看到树枝来回摇摆。

sentences.en: Max zips back and forth across the living room.
sentences.cn: 马克斯在客厅里快速地来回走动。

sentences.en: particular services like education, housing, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 具体服务如教育、住房等等。

sentences.en: Pilate ordered Jesus to be brought forth.
sentences.cn: 彼拉多命令把耶稣带上来。

sentences.en: She passed the needle through the rough cloth, back and forth.
sentences.cn: 她一针一针地缝那块粗布。

sentences.en: She rocks back and forth on her chair like a mischievous child.
sentences.cn: 她像个顽皮的孩子似的，坐在椅子上来回摇晃。

sentences.en: The house was still burning, pouring forth thick black smoke.
sentences.cn: 房子仍在燃烧，冒出浓浓的黑烟。

sentences.en: The patient can have apples, apple juice, apple sauce, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 病人可以食用苹果、苹果汁、苹果酱等。

sentences.en: The prosecution and defense were bandying accusations back and forth.
sentences.cn: 原告和被告你来我往，互相指责。

sentences.en: The windscreen wipers thudded back and forth.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的雨刮“啪嗒啪嗒”地来回摆动。

sentences.en: The windshield wipers clacked back and forth.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的雨刷咔嗒咔嗒来回摆动。

phrases.tran_cn: 引出，诱出；引起，唤起；博得
提出；发表；启航；（植物等）长出；放出
陈述，提出；出发；陈列；宣布

trans.tran_en: going out from a place or point, and moving forwards or outwards
